document.full_text: japan's nissan motor co ltd won new york city's 10-year contract to build the next generation of taxis for the city, a deal estimated to be worth more than $1 billion, the new york daily news reported on tuesday, citing unnamed sources.
document.title: nissan wins nyc taxi contract: daily news
lines_and_colors: japan's nissan motor co ltd won new york city's 10-year contract to build the next generation of taxis for the city, a deal estimated to be worth more than $1 billion, the new york daily news reported on tuesday, citing unnamed sources.
